title: How to Smoke The Perfect Turkey on a Pellet Grill
description:
Steve from Camp Chef takes you step by step on how to smoke the perfect turkey using the Camp Chef Pellet Grill and Smoker.  

For more info visit us at:

http://www.campchef.com/pellet-grills

asset.author: Camp Chef
asset.hookText:
